titles.title: METH Addiction Act
METH Addiction Act
Modernizing Eligible Treatment centers for Healing Addiction Act of 2019

A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to allow community addiction treatment facilities and community mental health facilities to register to dispense controlled substances through the practice of telemedicine, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Modernizing Eligible Treatment centers for Healing Addiction Act of 2019 or the METH Addiction Act
This bill directs the Drug Enforcement Administration to register certain community addiction-treatment facilities and community mental-health centers to administer controlled substances via telemedicine.
